nodes.text: Ulmac was a commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. Ulmac liked using disruptors to prove a point by disintegrating objects next to a target to show the seriousness of a situation. If the target refused to cooperate after the display, Ulmac  believed they got what they deserved.

Ulmac once had a sharpshooter friend of his test the KK-5 blaster pistol out, only to find that it was wildly inaccurate. In testing, the blaster would miss the target eight out of ten times. Ulmac related the story on the weapon's entry in the Datalog.
